main_definition: August, as an adjective or noun, can refer to the eighth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, describe something grand or venerable, and indicate a deep emotional response.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to the eighth month of the year
meanings_and_examples.example: The August heat made it difficult for people to enjoy outdoor activities.
She had an august presence, commanding respect and admiration from those around her.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Deeply impressive or moving; inspiring awe
meanings_and_examples.example: His speech was so august that it left the audience moved to tears.
